function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Recirculated air in HVAC system","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of HVAC system, use of HEPA filters","Technologies":"HEPA filters, UV-C germicidal lights","People":"Residents, visitors","Owner":"Homeowner, HVAC technician"},{"Description":"Negligible air exchange between adjacent townhouses","Impact":"Limited ventilation and potential for cross-contamination between units","Mitigation":"Installation of mechanical ventilation systems, regular monitoring of indoor air quality","Technologies":"Mechanical ventilation systems, air quality sensors","People":"Residents of adjacent townhouses","Owner":"Homeowner's association, property management"},{"Description":"Greater temperature range between winter and summer","Impact":"Increased stress on HVAC system, potential for temperature-related health issues","Mitigation":"Regular HVAC maintenance, insulation upgrades, use of zoning systems","Technologies":"Smart thermostats, insulation materials, zoning HVAC systems","People":"Residents","Owner":"Homeowner"}]}
